definition:
Campaign intentionally spreading false or misleading information
   to deceive and manipulate.

positive_examples: This is an example of disinformation campaign.
The disinformation campaign demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed disinformation campaign in this context.
A typical case of disinformation campaign would involve these features.
The concept of disinformation campaign applies here.
A coordinated effort to spread false or misleading information to deceive or manipulate target populations.
negative_examples: This is an example of c t intelligence operation, not disinformation campaign.
This represents offensive information operation in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: CTIntelligenceOperation, or other types of OffensiveInformationOperation
